Reviews.Title: “Great for the price”
Reviews.Author: sidekickgypsy1
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for Unofficial and wasn't looking for anything special. We just wanted somewhere to stay. This might go without saying, but bring a car. The free parking here is great, and downtown Champaign is only 5 min. away (FYI- Parking is free on Sundays downtown). The breakfast wasn't anything fancy, but it was diffidently nice to have a few muffins and save some money where we could on food expenses.

Reviews.Title: “Save your money (I am not kidding)”
Reviews.Author: SuperH8ter
Reviews.Content: There isn't a low enough rating for this hotel. I had reserved two nights at this hotel online (which is non-refundable, don't do it!). I didn't want to stay on one of the nights, so I offered the hotel to one of my friend. I had called two times and told them that my friend was going to stay in the room, that I had already paid for. When the day came this email came in from my friend: I came here to the hotel and they didn't have any record of you or me contacting them about tonight. They wouldn't let me in because they still expect you in tonight. They also told me they didn't have a record for you staying tomorrow night either. The guy at the desk was rude so I decided to go elsewhere. You can call them to verify that I didn't stay there - hopefully they'll be more cooperative with you. The guy at the desk also told me that the reservation is non transferable but wouldn't tell me which employee was working on Wednesday which gave me (us?) wrong information when I called. Sorry it didn't work out - I called and left a message on your voicemail but can't wait any longer as I want to make sure I have a room tonight and have to be at an event in about an hour. So because it is non-refundable, I won't be seeing that money that was charged to my account. This is the worst, most unreliable service I have ever received from a hotel. DO NOT STAY HERE! RUN FOR YOU LIFE! SAVE YOUR MONEY! Because my money is non-refundable, I will be staying there tomorrow night according to my reservation... Pray for me.

Reviews.Title: “Basic Price, Basic Amenities”
Reviews.Author: Augcruiser
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for at this basic hotel in the Super 8 chain. We did not expect the Ritz so were pretty much satisfied with all of it. We had a decent clean room for the night with two queen beds that were very comfortable. The room had a small refrigerator which was convenient to keep the drinks and sandwiches we had for the car trip. The bathroom was quite small, good shower. The carpet was worn in several places, and a few tears near the door. One strange thing was that most of the electrical outlets in the room seemed loose or something. Everytime we plugged in our chargers the plug fell out of the outlet. Only the bathroom outlets seemed to hold the plugs. Overall the place was quiet even though we were fairly close to the highway. Breakfast was a BIG disappointment. There was a half-used loaf of white bread, probably from the day before as we were in the room by 6 am when it opened. I was afraid to use the toaster. It looked old and dirty.The coffee was ok though only powdered creamer. There were no hot dishes - only some dry cereal. I did see some tiny packaged type muffins and some bananas and apples. I would skip the "breakfast" here and find somewhere else. My feeling is that you should either do it right or not at all. They did offer a complimentary local newspaper. The front desk staff were quite friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Efficient service”
Reviews.Author: Delinda B
Reviews.Content: They were very supportive to our emergency needs. We were able to continue renting our room at the basic price quoted to us, and even when they experienced a rush of students for the weekend, they managed to keep a room available for us during our crisis. I would recommend this hotel to family and friends in a crisis situation.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: texasdogshowman
Reviews.Content: I was traveling late in the day and saw this place. Drove up and explained I was tired and had a Pet with Me and did They allow pets. The other Super 8 in Champaign did not accept pets. Was given a room on the first floor and spent the night. The Desk Clerks were very accomodating and the room was clean and comfortable. Pet fee was $10 per day like posted in the Guest Book.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel manager is RUDE”
Reviews.Author: Scott H
Reviews.Content: I requested the charges for this hotel stay be refunded because of two reasons: 1) Breakfast is supposed to be included; what was served was small muffins (store-bought and sealed in plastic wrap), banana, apple, coffee. This is a poor excuse for a breakfast. 2) The primary problem is that my wife used the hotel iron to press a white blouse; the iron stained the blouse. When she raised the concern to the manager he offered only to put a different iron in the room. He refused to assist in resolving the problem in any other way (such as cleaning the blouse, compensating for the blouse, or discounting or refunding the hotel). He was extremely rude to both my wife and I and in the presence of our son. I travel frequently and am aware of expectations and reasonable customer service. This hotel did not meet these reasonable expectations and demonstrated no regard for customers. I booked this hotel via hotels.com and they were great, they contacted the hotel manager and confirmed the issue and have ISSUED a FULL REFUND. THANK YOU HOTELS.COM As I was leaving, another person was checking in; I paid them $10 to take their business elsewhere and they did!!! In regards to Super 8 Hotels, I will never stay with them again.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: churchhaus
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy or new here, but a good clean place to lay your head at night. Staff is very friendly, helpful and extremely accommodating. Prices are very low but don't let that frighten you. Close to shopping and eating.

Reviews.Title: “Poor service”
Reviews.Author: ValentineMary
Reviews.Content: When my 80+ year old parents needed to cancel, they called the day prior to the visit & were told to call back to talk to a manager. Five calls later over the course of18 hours, they claimed no manager available. They gave the same story to the representative from Wyndham rewards program when we tried to obtain their assistance. You do not want to deal with these people. Trust me.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!!!!”
Reviews.Author: PawPawTransplant
Reviews.Content: I was helping my brother move to the Champaign area and had to get an inexpensive hotel for the night while we waited for the apartment to be ready in the morning. I chose this hotel because it was pet friendly (they have 2 cats) and because they offered free WIFI. Once we got to the hotel I was told it was a $10 charge per animal, this fee is not displayed anywhere on the super 8 website, and instantly made it more expensive than nicer hotels in the area. The WIFI does NOT work I had a PC laptop and my brother had a MacBook, it wouldn't work with either, when I contacted the front desk about the issue, they said it was working fine and didn't offer to remedy the situation. Carpets were dirty and stained, matresses were stained with urine and blood, the floorboards sunk down a couple of inches when steping into them. Stay away, dont make the same mistake I did.

Reviews.Title: “excellent,nice and clean place”
Reviews.Author: dariagonz
Reviews.Content: The hotel room was very clean and the breakfast as well The front desc attendant was very polite and helpful must definitely I will recommend this hotel to my business partners and we will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Pet friendly and good value!!”
Reviews.Author: BS777
Reviews.Content: Comfortable room, pet friendly as we had 6 pets and stayed a few days as we were moving. Friendly staff and a decent breakfast. Walking distance to the mall (one short block) and right off I-74. Wireless in room worked very well!

Reviews.Title: “Super 8 202 W Marketview Dr. Champaigne, Il”
Reviews.Author: Leslie1981
Reviews.Content: I currently stayed at this Super 8 for a few weeks while waiting for some work to be done on my home. I would say that the hotel is decent and the owners gave me a great discount on my extended stay, best in town. They do accept pets and are nice about them. The staff is a stickler for not allowing smoking in non-smoking rooms, I reallty appreciated that. As far as appearance, it is a well worn and not specifically updated hotel. Be that as it may, it is homey, comfortable and in welcoming. The rooms are spacious and clean. I enjoyed my stay and the staff was pleasant and helpfull.

Reviews.Title: “BEDBUGS”
Reviews.Author: nikolai75
Reviews.Content: They have 'em. My body is covered in bites. They changed our room for us the next day, and gave us $15 off. I wasn't the one paying. Location is convenient for Illinois football games.

Reviews.Title: “DUMP! Any review higher than 1 star is a mistake. Consider camping b4 this place!”
Reviews.Author: AlowishisDevadander
Reviews.Content: Pros: None. Usually a roof and 4 wall would be a good thing, except here it keeps the nasty stuff in. Cons: Bugs,blood,urine on the toilet,dirty room, awful smell,disgusting hallways, poor service. They don't clean. Anyone saying this place is above disgusting is confused or blind with no sense of smell. They did not stay at th Super 8 next to the La Quinta. I'm a 30 yr old guy that is not picky about where he stays as long as it is clean. If I want urine and blood where I sleep I'll do it for free in a gas station bathroom...I'm not going to pay $100+ to do so. DEAD SERIOUS...camp or sleep in your car over this place. If you stay there after reading this review you are a MORON!

Reviews.Title: “A good 5 days”
Reviews.Author: ermame
Reviews.Content: We were in town to assist a relative for a few days. It was a comfortable place to meet our needs while we came and went in the city. The refrigerator in the room was very helpful and the basic breakfast was always plentiful. It was an economical stay!

Reviews.Title: “WARNING - 2 Super 8's - This one SUCKS”
Reviews.Author: FriscoTraveler88
Reviews.Content: There is another super 8, and much, much newer, about 1 1/2 miles east. Any review above 1 star must be for that location. This location had holes in the carpet, mold in the bathrooms, rusty/busted air conditioning units and nasty smell. We had to relocate one of our rooms because it smelled of urine. AVOID THIS HOTEL at all costs.

Reviews.Title: “Coming Back!”
Reviews.Author: orgfarmer84
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price! The rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff is super friendly. 6 minutes from campus and near various eateries, what more could you ask for. I will be staying again!

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected Pleasure”
Reviews.Author: fingolfinn
Reviews.Content: Just needed a place to crash for the night. Looking for the lowest price and they were it. I really was expecting the worst but was totally surprised. Room clean and smelled nice. big plus. coffee maker, refrig, iron/board. when I got up the bathroom as a total shock. remodeled with granite shower walls. kind of a scaled down version of nice chicago or ny hotel bathroom. The modern ones in older remodeled small room hotels. This is the only hotel to go to in chambana. You pay twice the price and get less.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!”
Reviews.Author: ElinaIzzy
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, great location, great staff, great accommodations! The price is extremely affordable, even for a college student like me. The room comes with everything I could ask for, it has a very nice re-modeled bathroom, very clean and maintained. The air conditioner works great! The blinds actually blocked out most of the sun allowing me to sleep in a little longer. The staff is very nice and always helpful. Both Harish and Ila have been great! The free breakfast in the morning has a modest but filling selection of food. For the price charged, this is a great hotel to stay at! I would recommend to anyone who just needs a place to rest their head either on business or leisure!

Reviews.Title: “What more can you ask for in Champaign?”
Reviews.Author: AnnaMaus
Reviews.Content: Good wifi, nice shower, comfy beds, very friendly and helpful staff, decent location and extremely reasonable rates.

Reviews.Title: “Cant beat it for the price and service”
Reviews.Author: mosaiclady
Reviews.Content: I stayed her 4 nights during the Ebert film fest. I was dependent on public transit to get back and forth to downtown and this place is very convenient. Bus stop is a block away. There's a huge mall across the street and plenty places to eat: Chevy's, Paneras, Mc Donalds, etc. Service was fine-someone called after I got in, to make sure my room was okay. I chatted with the family owners, who are very pleasant and friendly. The continental breakfast was what you would expect: cereal, juice, pastry. That said, a bit more protein would have been nice-maybe some hard boiled eggs or even some peanut butter-not complaining, just saying:). I have no complaints and will be returning next year.

Reviews.Title: “"Not so super" Super 8”
Reviews.Author: VAgabondGeneva_IL
Reviews.Content: Very basic accommodation. The staff was friendly, beds were comfortable, room clean, but the bath towels in the bathroom were in need of replacement (several bath towels had large holes). We only stayed one night, discovered the holes in the towels when showering in the morning . Unfortunately, I would hesitate to recommend this establishment.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place and staff!”
Reviews.Author: sbjj22
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Super 8 for two weeks while I was attending a training session for work nearby. Everyone working always has a smile on there face and is more than willing to help you out in any way possible. They are just awesome people and I would not have wanted to stay anywhere else while being so far away from home. The rooms are spotless and everything is maintained. Not to mention the delicious simple continental breakfast. If I return to Champaign this hotel is my number 1 choice!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms, will come back!”
Reviews.Author: phelmers
Reviews.Content: Visiting town for the wrestling state finals. Walked in the afternoon without a reservation and got one of the last rooms. Room was clean and functional. Sheets pink, prefer white. Coffee and bananas in the morning. Very close to Chevy's mexican, Alexander steak house and Panera. We visited all during the break. Straight shot to Uof I campus. Friendly staff, very courteous. Will come back!

Reviews.Title: “More Bang for the Buck!”
Reviews.Author: sechap
Reviews.Content: The Patel's run a great hotel. They have all the conveniences of their neighboring competitors, but for less money per night. They are very accommodating; I am a pillow lover and when I asked them for additional, they simply asked how many!lol Clean, modern, hospitable, comfortable all describe the facility of Super 8 in Champaign IL. I would recommend this hotel to everyone...get more bang for your hard-earned money!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised!”
Reviews.Author: mrmark719
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a really nice hotel! I paid $40/night for a queen room...the lowest price in Champaign, and this was much better than a typical motel. Service was friendly at check-in, location is excellent, right next to a bus stop and the mall. Room was a great size, and cleanliness was fine, with the exception of my blanket...there was some hair on it, but no biggie. Smoking and non-smoking rooms are in separate wings, so the smell doesn't interfere in the non-smoking section. Refrigerator in the room was a nice amenity. Free wi-fi for guests. Staff even called the room a half hour after I checked in, to make sure everything met my standards. I'd definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “It's a Super 8, nothing more, nothing less.”
Reviews.Author: atgt13
Reviews.Content: We stayed here to get a start on a drive from Madison, WI back to Atlanta, GA. We arrived late at night, and the attendant was very helpful and friendly, especially for 1am. We paid the average price, which was a little steep for a motel at $55+taxes+fees. We paid a $10 fee for a room that allowed our small dog. The following complaints aren't outside of our expectations, just comments. This is what you get at a super 8, and those other posts who expected anything more are expecting a bit much out of a motel. Pros: Free newspaper, refrigerator, TV, heater worked, all as expected. Cons: Hard mattress (must be 20 years old), flat pillows, breakfast only consisted of toast, cereal, juice, danish, no hot food. I accidentally left my pillow in the room, and called the next day, but the manager was not helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, and reasonable.”
Reviews.Author: kb9vcn
Reviews.Content: Clean, comfortable, and reasonable. Friendly service. Have stayed there many times over the past few years, and never had a bad experience. Will use again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: sjacobson
Reviews.Content: Clean, good owners very accommodating. Close to shopping and good eats.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Bones1956
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here numerous times. Staff is very courteous!! Other hotels should take lessons from them and really listen to the guests. They try to accomodate in all situations. Hotel is very clean! There should be more hotels like this Super 8. We have stayed at other Super 8 and Days Inn hotels but this is our favorite.

Reviews.Title: “pretty good for a motel.”
Reviews.Author: chief-illiniwek-2011
Reviews.Content: I am a college student at University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign. I stayed at the super 8 because I had to be down at campus 2 days before the lease on my apartment in champaign started. I wasn't looking for anything fancy, just a place to sleep for 2 nights. The staff was very friendly, except for this one lady, could could have been a little friendlier. The room and bed was clean. the coffee maker was the only thing that didn't look the cleanest. The manager was very accommodating in the sense that I wasn't sure if I would need to stay the second night because I might have been able to move into my apartment 1 day early, so he allowed me to leave my bags in the room a few hours after check out time after the first night till i found out if i needed the room again. (<-- sorry for the poor sentence structure, feeling kinda lazy) Anyways, it was a good experience, and I'd stay there again. BTW the mall is across the street.

Reviews.Title: “Smelly, Dirty, Run Down, Bad Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: MinnesotaHeidi
Reviews.Content: I am not above staying at Super 8hotels. We stayed at the Super 8 in Dunbar, WV the next night, which is a beautiful hotel. Our room in Champaign, IL was so smelly; carpet was old and dirty looking, we were afraid to take shoes off. We were afraid to even sit on the bed it looked like it belonged in the dump. There was spit on the picture above the bed. All in all it was the worst room I have ever seen. We went to the Baymont a block away and for 9 dollars more we had a beautiful, clean, awesome room with a white clean fluffy comforter. They told us they get lots of people from the Super 8. Also donâ€™t expect a refund if you donâ€™t stay. They were not willing to give a refund of any kind since we checked in. We told them we did not even touch the bed. They said they couldnâ€™t rent it out since we had been in the room, which is bull. They were argumentive, and rude people to deal with. I normally donâ€™t write reviews but you need to know how awful this hotel is. Whoever has written the 5 star reviews has not been much of a traveler and doesnâ€™t care where they lay their heads. Other hotels within walking distance are so much better. How on earth can this hotel be ranked #4 in the area?

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE, NASTY & DISGUSTING!”
Reviews.Author: Nekkokitty
Reviews.Content: Upon check in, my elderly handicapped mother and sister asked for more towels and an extra sheet. We were "given" 2 extra towels -- to equal 4 total for 3 people!! Once in the room, the A/C apparently was not functioning as well as it smelled like a cat had peed in it. When I went to complain and asked to be moved, the female at the desk grudgingly did so. The only room left on the ground floor. The new room's A/C unit worked, but the tiolet did not. When we called the desk, she came down and "fixed" it. We went to dinner and I received a phone call that my husband was in an accident on our farm. My mother & sister informed the "lady" at the desk of this and they were informed that we would be charged for the room because she "now had 2 rooms to clean because of us." Mine you, we were only in the 1st room for less than 5 minutes and in the 2nd room no more than 15 minutes total. If the 1st room would have been "cleaned" in the 1st place, we wouldn't have need to move!! Upon contacting the Corporate offiice, my mother was assured someone would investigate and call her back by July 3. NO ONE DID. She finally called them back and they said she will be charged since we went somewhere else.... Yeah. A hospital in Indianapolis, where my husband was taken after a tractor flipped on him. Never have I encounter such rude, nasty people. I'd rather sleep in my car!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “The staff at the Super 8 is incredibly nice and accommadating!!”
Reviews.Author: chicagomona
Reviews.Content: I travel every year from Chicago to Urbana-Champaign with 50-60 5th graders as part of their end of year field trip. For the last 3 years we have stayed at the Super 8 in Champaign. The family that runs the hotel is so nice and so accommodating to us and our large group of students. The manager goes out of her way to help us move all of the students though the continental breakfast line. She even helps them carry their bowls of cereal back to their rooms. She is so nice that it makes them feel like they have a mom with them on their trip.

Reviews.Title: “Been staying here weekly for a few years. Definately would recommend!”
Reviews.Author: GravyTrainSTL
Reviews.Content: I've been going to the Super 8 on Marketview in Champaign for about three years. The rooms are clean and comfortable, it is convenient to restaurants nearby, and the staff is wonderful. I do not usually partake in the breakfast, but the coffee is always good. Every once in a while I'll have a muffin or a pastry. The hotel has been recently renovated and the updates are wonderful. New desks, new mattresses, new dressers, and in-room refrigerators all make my weekly visits there even more comfortable than before.

Reviews.Title: “Grat Deal, Price, Service, People,and Location”
Reviews.Author: oldmanSeattle
Reviews.Content: My three night stay was completely satisfactory. Everyone was pleasant,unobtrusive, and very helpful. I made a further reservation to return again about a week later and again enjoyed my brief stay. The motel is well located and has easy access to a first class transit system: so one need not rent a car. All this for very reasonable rates in a very quiet building. Sncerely, Allan J. Harrison Profeesor emeritus University of Illinois

Reviews.Title: “will come back again”
Reviews.Author: kbron1959
Reviews.Content: The hotel was neat and clean. The clientelle was very accomodating. We did not take advantage of the continental breakfast, so can't comment on that. Laundry facility for patron was clean. Will definitely come back to this establishment.

Reviews.Title: “Would recommend this hotel for the value and cleanliness.”
Reviews.Author: justme0013
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel 2 times while in the area. Would highly recommend it! The rooms are always clean (including the bathrooms)! The staff is more than friendly and helpful. Very quiet also.

Reviews.Title: “Very concerned staff, great value and good location.”
Reviews.Author: kendifrancesca
Reviews.Content: While not a hotel with a lot of ameneties it's a great value for a short stay. The staff was very accomadating and concerned about my needs. The hotel is conveinient to most things in Champaign and is a great value. I travel to Champaign quite often and depending on the length of my stay, I will use the Super 8 again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for a visit”
Reviews.Author: dlj1504
Reviews.Content: I used this hotel the first time I visited my son and family. I was put in a room close to the office in refence to traveling alone. I was happy with the hotel and the service so I used it again the next time. I was surprised (and impressed) they remembered my name. The sevice is very good and the employess are friendly and helpful. I used this hotel 3 to 4 times a year.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly service”
Reviews.Author: lpie58
Reviews.Content: Shortly after I got into my room I received a phone call from the front desk asking me if everything was ok, I have never had that happen to me, even in upscale, 5 star hotels, that was such a nice touch. The location is convenient, close to the university, restaurants, and shopping. The room was very clean, and I was pleasantly surprised to find a refrigerator in the room. The complimentary breakfast was a big plus. I will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Staff went out of their way to be helpful.”
Reviews.Author: fitmama56
Reviews.Content: My consultant firm booked me into a smoking room because that was ther only thing available. I called the staff at Super-8 and told them my concern. I have extreme allergies and was really worried about my stay. When I arrived the staff person I had previous spoken with had changed my room for a non-smoking one. I was so appreciative that she went out of her way to help me. Thank You!!

Reviews.Title: “outstanding service from the staff”
Reviews.Author: VirgilTulsaok
Reviews.Content: The room, both times, 4 nights were clean and well main tained. Rooms are reasonably priced for a University town, close to everything; food, shopping, interstate highway system. We can't say enough about the excellent service from the entire staff. We have travelled all over this country over 40 years and this is a first. We recommended the location to our relatives and we stayed a second time. We'll be back. And, the coffee's always fresh.

Reviews.Title: “A very friendly, nicely furnished, spotless hotel.”
Reviews.Author: rmwhitlow
Reviews.Content: I am a government employee who spends 18-20 weekends a year in the Champaign area, and for some 6-7 years, I have stayed exclusively at the Super 8 in Champaign. The owners, Mr. and Mrs. Patel, are always at the desk, always very welcoming, and very accommodating in any way a traveler would need. Because my trips are reimbursed, I could stay at the Holiday Inn, the Baymont, the Marriott, or the Ramada within blocks of their location, but I have come to feel very much at home here and offer my highest possible recommendation. After scores of visits, I will continue to stay here until I retire in a few years.

Reviews.Title: “Ok for the price”
Reviews.Author: TravelerGEO
Reviews.Content: For the price this place was not that bad, not the greatest beds and pillows around but for the price it was clean. The WiFi worked great and it is close to everything, easy on and off the Interstate as well as being around some places to eat. If you want and interesting experience, Try walking over to Alexander's where you will pick you own steak and cook it yourself. I would stay here again, not the best hotel in the world, but an ok sleep for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Not A Very Pleasant Stay!”
Reviews.Author: mathgenius
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for! I was mislead by some of the reviews of this place. This was the first time in my life, that upon opening the mini fridge, I was greeted by a pound of slimy "green" cold cuts, a sticky almost empty jar of grape jelly, and worst of all, a nasty, sticky opened jar of mayonnaise. My friend and I almost threw up, as we gingerly disposed of our "surprises". Controls on the heater/ac were so old, we could barely turn them to get some fresh air into the room. Some "suspect-looking" people in the parking lot, and in the breakfast area gave us the "willies". "Free" breakfast was the worst I've ever seen in a motel---and I'm sure it was included in the price. I've stayed at many a nice Super 8 in the past 20 years (see my review on the Rhinelander, WI Super 8), and have never encountered one as bad as this one. Even from the outside, it gives off some bad vibes. Couldn't wait to check out. Other reviewers talked about the nice lady at the front desk---she must have taken the day off when we were there. We're coming back again to Champaign in July---guess where we won't be staying?

Reviews.Title: “Would prefer to not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: windblownstar
Reviews.Content: I knew I was taking a gamble booking this room. It was tolerable, but barely. The bathroom was gross. It looked like it hadn't been swept, let alone mopped, in weeks. There were ants and spiders in the bathroom as well as in the bedroom (I saw an ant on one of the beds). The shower was dirty, hair left over from previous guests. We were on the first floor, and could hear the people walking around above us. The breakfast was typical skimpy continental breakfast. However, the air conditioner did work very well, and cooling was not a problem. And the people at the front desk were nice, and even helped me out by making a few xeroxes for me.

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe the other reviewers - this place is a dump”
Reviews.Author: jonellen
Reviews.Content: I was desperate for a room in Champaign this weekend (5-3-08) and booked the only room I could find, and specifically requested a non-smoking room since I have respiratory problems. First, the young gentlemen smoking in the parking lot, hanging out in their pickup trucks, was not a good sign. Then I was told that the only room available was a smoking room, which I told the young lady would not do. She insisted that I only requested a nonsmoking room, but I told her that it was not a request, and that we needed a nonsmoking room. She told me to come back in an hour and she'd see what she could do. We came back and she was able to find us a nonsmoking room. Well, the room is another story. We stayed in Room 212 and it was gross. The tub was full of mildew, the towels all felt like sandpaper, and when I went to turn on the air conditioner, the door to the unit fell off, and the dials were rusted and unreadable. i went to plug in my phone charger by the nightstand and found a beer poptop under the nightstand and the walls were streaked with a brown substance, which looked like nicotine (Perhaps the room was a nonsmoking room at one time, but it was really gross). The sheets were pink and threadbare. The pillows had seen better days, too. The beds were okay. I know that people have given this place a good rating, and that is the only reason I booked a room there. I would have slept in the car, but the women at the front desk said that no refund was possible. Stay away, especially people who are accustomed to staying in clean hotels.

HotelInfo.Name: Super 8 Motel Champaign
HotelInfo.Address: 202 Marketview Drive, Champaign, IL 61820
